definition: outer coat of especially sheep and yaks, shear the wool from
details:
noun
- outer coat of especially sheep and yaks
= synonyms: wool
- a soft bulky fabric with deep pile
- tanned skin of a sheep with the fleece left on
= synonyms: sheepskin
- the wool of a sheep or similar animal
verb
- shear the wool from
= synonyms: shear
- rip off
= synonyms: pluck
